LanguageData.MURWallLight_LightRadDesc: How far the light radiates from the source. Default: 8
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SteelCostDesc: How much steel a single light costs to build. Default: 5
LanguageData.MURWallLight_PowerCostDesc: How much power a single light consumes. Default: 10
LanguageData.MURWallLight_ShowRadiusDesc: Show approximate area around lights that will be lit. EXPERIMENTAL: Currently only works with the default light radius of 8.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WarningBlocked: 必须面向可通过的格子
LanguageData.MURWallLight_WarningBoth: 必须放在墙上，面向可通过的格子
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertDisableRadius: Show Lit Area currently only works with the default light radius setting of 8. Disabling.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertReload: 请重启游戏来更新设置
LanguageData.MURWallLight_DestroyedWall: 墙被拆了，墙灯也被摧毁了
